title: (x) Sonictrance - Gor {BJ}
content:
i was just curious about this font. and i'm lazy and leaving the house,   
so if anyone knows it and wants to show off... ;)   
 ![tracks](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020205613im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22512.jpg)   
 ![tracks2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020205613im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22513.jpg)
author: Isaac

comments.content: I think it's from Garage Fonts, Thor or Gor?

i was expecting something past five minutes.   
i guess i should know better by now. it's an   
interesting look, but might be better used if it   
traded places with avant garde. the ad is   
so small i could barely read the copy.   
but that's just me.   
   
thanks bj, and thanks yves for the link.

It is indeed, BJ! Stefan Kjartansson's inimitable   
 [Frankenstein Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020205613/http:/www.garagefonts.com/showing.html?sku=GF059001X1M1&start=1). Truckloads of personality   
and style, and it looks good to boot!
